Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath

Interface EvaluationContext

All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewEvaluationContext
public interface EvaluationContext
Provides the context for evaluating FHIRPath expressions. This interface defines methods for resolving resources, functions, and variables during FHIRPath evaluation.

The evaluation context is responsible for:

  • Resolving resource references to actual resource collections
  • Resolving function names to function implementations
  • Resolving variable references to their values
  • Providing evaluation options that control the behavior of the evaluation
  • Providing access to the current input context (the focus of the evaluation)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Collection
    getInputContext()
    Returns the current input context (the focus of the evaluation).
    NamedFunction
    resolveFunction(String name)
    Resolves a function name to its implementation.
    Optional<ResourceCollection>
    resolveResource(String resourceCode)
    Resolves a resource type code to a collection of resources of that type.
    Collection
    resolveVariable(String name)
    Resolves a variable name to its value.

  • Method Details

    • resolveResource

      @Nonnull Optional<ResourceCollection> resolveResource(@Nonnull String resourceCode)
      Resolves a resource type code to a collection of resources of that type.
      Parameters:
      resourceCode - The code of the resource type to resolve
      Returns:
      An optional containing the resource collection if the resource type exists, or an empty optional if it does not

    • resolveFunction

      @Nonnull NamedFunction resolveFunction(@Nonnull String name) throws NoSuchFunctionError
      Resolves a function name to its implementation.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the function to resolve
      Returns:
      The function implementation
      Throws:
      NoSuchFunctionError - If no function with the given name exists

    • resolveVariable

      @Nonnull Collection resolveVariable(@Nonnull String name)
      Resolves a variable name to its value.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the variable to resolve
      Returns:
      The value of the variable

    • getInputContext

      @Nonnull default Collection getInputContext()
      Returns the current input context (the focus of the evaluation).

      By default, this is the value of the predefined variable "%context".

      Returns:
      The current input context
